name: kashiwanoha-workshop-tools
description: Development tools for the Kashiwanoha AI Workshop landing page - Angular components, Supabase integration, and deployment helpers
author: Kazuglobal

commands.name: add-component
commands.description: Create a new Angular component with proper structure

commands.name: supabase-query
commands.description: Generate Supabase queries for workshop_applications table

commands.name: build-deploy
commands.description: Build and check the Angular app for deployment

commands.name: add-form-field
commands.description: Add a new field to the workshop application form

commands.name: check-supabase
commands.description: Check Supabase connection and database status
